name: Barbarian (Noel Studios)
description:
This is a university project that me and 3 other colleagues have worked on and submitted as part of our Group Games Development Project module.

I took the role of the team leader as well as lead programmer and have worked on various scrips, level design and cinematic timeline creation as well as UI design.

Above all else ensure that the project met its deadlines and was able to achieve its submissions time frame and that we kept to our original game design document.

Barbarian is an action adventure platformer game where our character is in search of his wife who was stolen by an evil force.

Explore different levels in search of your other half.

The game consists of 6 levels, a variety of puzzles, platforming elements and close range attacking enemies. 

Hope you all enjoy!

Noel Studios
